solution_line_template: Finishing geography took the most time, which is {history_time} * {geography_multiplier} = <<{history_time}*{geography_multiplier}={geography_time}>>{geography_time} minutes.
In total, for all three subjects, Max needed {biology_time} + {history_time} + {geography_time} = <<{biology_time}+{history_time}+{geography_time}={total_time}>>{total_time} minutes.
